data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 8,751 believers in Blekinge against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Blekinge, Sweden
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 8,751 believers in Blekinge, Sweden how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 17 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Blekinge do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Blekinge, Sweden will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kurd, Kurmanji people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Blekinge.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Blekinge who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Jesus, make the 76,331 people in the state of Blekinge who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

location.name: Blekinge
location.people_groups_list: Tajik, Thai, Tibetan, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking, Turk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tajik (26,000), Thai (31,000), Tibetan (1,000), Moroccan, Arabic-speaking (5,600), Turk (33,000)
